div.p: Building on a tradition of excellence, Bowling Green Schools lead the way in education for all.

div.a: April Board Meeting April 20, @District Office, 1211 Center Street, Begins @ 11:00 AM
Kindergarten & Preschool Pre-Registration April 27, @BGISD Elementary Schools,
BGJHS Bands Spring Concert May 5, @BGJHS, Begins @ 6:00 PM
Dishman McGinnis Selects Shawn Perkins as Principal

p.span: The Dishman McGinnis Principal Selection Committee has announced Shawn Perkins as the next principal. The announcement was made to faculty and staff via Google Meet on Friday morning, April 17, 2020. He will officially begin principal responsibilities on May 1, 2020.

a.title: Click to read more about: Dishman McGinnis Selects Shawn Perkins as Principal

div.a: Read More about Dishman McGinnis Selects Shawn Perkins as Principal

p.span: Bowling Green Elementary Schools will host Kindergarten Pre-Registration Monday, April 27 through Friday, May 1, 2020. Families of children turning five years old by August 1, with plans to enroll in BGISD Kindergarten may visit any elementary school during the week to complete pre-registration. Families residing outside the BGISD boundaries with plans to attend the district during 2020-2021 should complete a non-resident application by April 15, 2020.
BGISD Preschool is located at T. C. Cherry Elementary. Students interested in enrolling must meet enrollment requirements.

a.title: Click to read more about: Kindergarten and Preschool Pre-Registration: April 27-May 1

div.a: Read More about Kindergarten and Preschool Pre-Registration: April 27-May 1
Music Education Program Receives National Recognition

p.span: The Bowling Green Independent School District has been honored with the Best Communities for Music Education designation from The NAMM Foundation for its outstanding commitment to music education. BGISD is one of six Kentucky school districts to receive the recognition, with others including Clark County, Jessamine County, Owensboro Independent, Paducah Independent, and Russell Independent.

a.title: Click to read more about: Music Education Program Receives National Recognition

div.a: Read More about Music Education Program Receives National Recognition

p.span: Per recommendation of Governor Andy Beshear, Bowling Green City Schools will remain closed until at least Monday, May 4, 2020. Bowling Green City Schools will continue to utilize NTI, or non-traditional instruction, with both online resources and distribution of paper copies as needed.

All Bowling Green City Schools front offices are open and available for business via online and phone communications. However, effective March 20, 2020, the offices will be closed to the public. To reach the district office, call 270-746-2200.
This news story will be updated as information is provided. Thank you for your patience and understanding as we work through plans for our students, employees, and families.

a.title: Click to read more about: BGISD SCHOOL CLOSING INFORMATION

div.a: Read More about BGISD SCHOOL CLOSING INFORMATION
